task4
Class Task4

java.lang.Object
  task4.Task4

public class Task4
extends java.lang.Object

Tara Schultz COSC 671.101 Project 1 Task 4 - Program Modification. Using the set up from Tasks 1-3, you will now perform a simple software maintenance task. You are to make the following modifications to the Stutter.c program: 1. Change the program from C to Java 2. Format the program according to the Java Programming Style Guidelines and the Tips for Maintainable Java Code discussed and handed out in class 3. Document your Java code in Javadoc format and generate the Javadoc API HTML files for your code

Author:
tarayang

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Creates a File object to read the contents of the specified file. File name is a constant String FILE_NAME. Executes method Stut with the created file.

Parameters:
args - the arguments

Stut

private static void Stut(java.io.File textFile)
Reads the contents of the text file by character checking for duplicate words. If a non-alphanumeric character is found it is omitted.

Parameters:
textFile - the file to read

deleteChar

private static boolean deleteChar(char C)
Delete checks whether or not the character should be deleted. C can be deleted if it is in included in the array of chars to be omitted.

Parameters:
C - the character
Returns:
true, if C should be deleted

same

private static boolean same(char[] a,
                            char[] b)
Same checks whether or not the specified character arrays are the same.

Parameters:
a - the first char array to be compared
b - the second char array to be compared
Returns:
true, if the contents of the arrays are equal

copy

private static void copy(char[] original,
                         char[] copy)
Copy copies the contents of the original array to the copy.

Parameters:
original - the array to copy
copy - the copied array
